Articles.Content:
Hi all!

Older KSP saves DO work in 0.22, but I've noticed a slightly frustrating issue! Due to the new tweaks to landing gear in KSP 0.22, any pre-existing ships in an older save, when loaded in 0.22 for the first time, will randomly have their gear raised!

This means, when you select a ship landed on another planet in an older save for the first time, there is a HUGE chance, it will just fall over on game load as you don't have time to lower the legs or any quick way to keep your ship upright...

I was wondering if there's a way anybody can tell me to edit my persistence file to return the landing legs on my ships to the lowered position before I load them in 0.22 for the first time...? Is there a simple attribute I can adjust, like "lowered=true" or some such...?

Thanks for any help!

Edited October 16, 2013 by darkstrike
